title: Watch Face DSX
summary: DSX Watch Face for Android Wear Clock
description: Cool watch face design based on your favorite game interface. Augment your device with the new cool watch face.FEATURES:- Date Information- 12/24 auto-format- Ambient (dimmed) mode- High Resolution Design- Round and Square watches SupportINSTRUCTION:1. Install Watch Face2. Wait a minute2. Go to Android Wear Application3. Choose DSX Watch Face4. descriptionHTML:
Cool watch face design based on your favorite game interface. Augment your device with the new cool watch face.

FEATURES:

- Date Information
- 12/24 auto-format
- Ambient (dimmed) mode
- High Resolution Design
- Round and Square watches Support

INSTRUCTION:

1. Install Watch Face
2. Wait a minute
2. Go to Android Wear Application
3. Choose DSX Watch Face
4. Enjoy!

The watchface deus has been tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R, ASUS ZenWatch, Sony SmartWatch ex and other.
comments: Slick design, no date customisation A nicely designed watch face. Only missing the ability to change the date format.
